mapper.select: SELECT c.commitmentNo,code.codeName,d.name donationPurposeName FROM [commitment] c JOIN [code] ON c.paymentMethodID=code.ID JOIN [donationPurpose] d ON c.donationPurposeID=d.ID where sponsorID IN (select ID from [sponsor] where sponsorNo=#{sponsorNo})
select s.ID sponsorID,c.ID,c.commitmentNo,c.donationPurposeID,c.paymentMethodID from sponsor s JOIN commitment c ON s.ID=c.sponsorID where s.sponsorNo=#{sponsorNo} AND c.paymentMethodID=12
